mapper.select: SELECT b.brdid, b.empid, b.title, CASE WHEN b.regdate > CURDATE() THEN DATE_FORMAT(b.regdate, '%H:%i:%s') ELSE DATE_FORMAT(b.regdate, '%Y-%m-%d') END as regdate, b.deadline, a.nickname as writer, b.count, b.likes, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM brd_employment_reply c WHERE c.brdid = b.brdid) as repcount, (SELECT -1*DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE, a.deadline) from brd_employment a where a.brdid = b.brdid) as dDate FROM brd_employment b LEFT JOIN info_userinfo a on b.userno = a.userno ORDER BY b.brdid DESC LIMIT #{skiprow}, #{pagerow}
